channel.title: announce on Tremor
channel.description: Recent content in announce on Tremor

item.title: Tremor is now Open Source
item.description: The tremor project was released as an Open Source software project on 22nd February 2020 at 20:02:02. Catch as at BOB2020 on the 28th February 2020 in Berlin where we will be talking about our usage of the Rust programming language to build high performance and high density production systems with Tremor.
